Fabien PrÃ©vost began his career as a Consultant in the United States before moving to Paris where he joined the Boston Consulting Group (BCG) as a Senior Consultant in the manufacturing and distribution sectors. In 1992 he founded Proxidis, a specialised distribution group that was floated on the Paris Bourse (Nouveau MarchÃ©) in 1996.
